MemberSignature.Value: public int InstanceCount { get; set; }
.property instance int32 InstanceCount
Public Property InstanceCount As Integer
member this.InstanceCount : int with get, set
public int? MinInstanceCount { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> MinInstanceCount
Public Property MinInstanceCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
member this.MinInstanceCount : Nullable<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: MinInstanceCount is the minimum number of instances that must be up to meet the EnsureAvailability safety check during operations like upgrade or deactivate node. The actual number that is used is max( MinInstanceCount, ceil( MinInstancePercentage/100.0 * InstanceCount) ). Note, if InstanceCount is set to -1, during MinInstanceCount computation -1 is first converted into the number of nodes on which the instances are allowed to be placed according to the placement constraints on the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public int? MinInstancePercentage { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> MinInstancePercentage
Public Property MinInstancePercentage As Nullable(Of Integer)
member this.MinInstancePercentage : Nullable<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: MinInstancePercentage is the minimum percentage of InstanceCount that must be up to meet the EnsureAvailability safety check during operations like upgrade or deactivate node. The actual number that is used is max( MinInstanceCount, ceil( MinInstancePercentage/100.0 * InstanceCount) ). Note, if InstanceCount is set to -1, during MinInstancePercentage computation, -1 is first converted into the number of nodes on which the instances are allowed to be placed according to the placement constraints on the service.
